spell.name: Telekinetic Grab

entries: [icon](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/177655380/87rp6FCelCJ5mKtyyjLdMg/med.png)

You crush your runes and focus on a single object that weighs up to 600lbs within range and raises it into the air. When you cast the spell, and as an action on subsequent turns, you may exert your will on the object.
If the object isn't being worn or carried, you automatically move it up to 30 feet in any direction, but not beyond the range of this spell.

If the object is worn or carried by a creature, you must make an ability check with your spellcasting ability contested by that creature's Strength check. If you succeed, you pull the object away from that creature and can move it up to 30 feet in any direction but not beyond the range of this spell.

spell.name: Flames of Zamorak

components.m: 2 Blood runes, 1 Air rune, 4 Fire runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/196506489/vLepDMxrPRSyoNbCpqk3DQ/med.png)
You must be wielding a Zamorak Staff, Staff of the Dead, or Toxic Staff of the Dead in order to cast this spell.

You crush your runes and call down the power of Zamorak to conjure unholy flames to scorch and burn creatures. You create a continuous line of unholy fire, which must start within range. The fire is up to 40 feet long, 40 feet high, 1 foot thick, and can twist and turn as many times as the caster wishes. All creatures within the line must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 6d6 fire damage and 6d6 necrotic damage on a fail, and half as much on a success.
If a creatures rolls a natural 1 on this initial saving throw, they must make a second Dexterity saving throw, taking 6d6 fire damage and 6d6 necrotic damage on a fail, and half as much on a success.

spell.name: Saradomin Strike

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/196501294/H08gq3R4w0B1AcPfqAB2CA/max.png)
You must be wielding a Saradomin Staff or Staff of Light in order to cast this spell.

You crush your runes and call down the power of Saradomin to strike creatures with a powerful bolt of holy lightning. Make a ranged spell attack against a creature. On a hit, a pure white bolt of electricity descend from the sky, dealing 6d6 lightning damage and 6d6 radiant damage.

The electricity crackles outward towards all creatures within 15 feet of the original target. If the original attack roll would hit these additional creatures, they take 4d6 lighting damage and 4d6 radiant damage. On a critical hit, the additional creatures receive the same damage the initial target takes.

Hit or miss, the claws immediately attempt to bind the target. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become paralyzed for one minute. If your attack hit the target, it makes this initial saving throw at disadvantage. A creature affected by this spell makes another Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/181984522/xe9QXmAOLw-GtMKdcBrwWQ/med.png)

You crush your runes and cast a master level curse spell meant to prevent a creature from escaping. The creature makes an Intelligence saving throw. On a fail, it loses the ability to teleport by any means for the duration.
This spell cannot be counterspelled and only the wish spell can remove this effect.

spell.name: Enchant Zenyte Jewelry

components.m: 20 Soul runes, 1 Cosmic rune, 20 Blood runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [icon](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/181985597/sD9WLxaamneis4ZjF0eB_Q/med.png)

You crush your runes and enchant one piece of zenyte jewelry with magical power. A zenyta ring becomes a Ring of Suffering, a zenyte necklace becomes a Necklace of Anguish, a zenyte bracelet becomes a Tormented Bracelet, and a zenyte amulet becomes an Amulet of Torture.

spell.name: Fire Surge

components.m: 1 Wrath rune, 7 Air runes, 10 Fire runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/images/d/dc/Fire_Surge_icon_%28mobile%29.png)

You crush your runes and conjure a massive orb of fire to hurl at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes fire damage equal to 12d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

spell.name: Cure Plant

components.m: 1 Astral rune, 8 Earth runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192006164/zhwhnat1aqLt4D3lYtuX8Q/max.png)

You crush your runes and channel revitalizing energy into nearby plants and earth. Choose a spot within range. In a 20-foot cube, all plant life of your choice is brought back to a living, healthy state, and the surrounding soil is rendered enriched and full of nutrients.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the size of the cube is doubled for each slot level above 1st, spending additional runes equal to those listed in Components for each spell slot above 1st.

spell.name: Stat Spy

components.m: 2 Astral runes, 2 Cosmic runes, 2 Body runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192005298/ACfz0KV5D1XRT9IXBWxX_g/med.png)

You crush your runes and gain some insight on a particular creature. When you cast this spell, name a specific creature or envision one with which you are familiar, then roll a d6. On a 1-4, the spell fails and you learn no information. On a 5-6, the spell succeeds, and you learn the following about the creature:
• Ability scores
• Saving throw modifiers
• Proficient skills

The DM may inform you of additional traits. You may only cast this spell on a particular creature once per day. You automatically succeed in casting this spell if you have seen the creature in person.

spell.name: Geomancy

components.m: 3 Astral runes, 3 Nature runes, 8 Earth runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192005298/ACfz0KV5D1XRT9IXBWxX_g/med.png)

You crush your runes and gain remote vision on a location. Choose a location that you have visited at least once in the past. An invisible arcane eye appears in this location. The eye has 120 feet of vision, shares any special senses you posses, and can see in every direction. As a bonus action, you may switch your vision between your own eyes, and the arcane eye, or vice versa. As an action, you can move the eye up to 30 feet in any direction. A solid barrier blocks the eye's movement, but the eye can pass through an opening as small as 1 inch in diameter.

spell.name: Health Potion Share

components.m: 2 Astral runes, 10 Water runes, 10 Earth runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192007775/SDnx8VBUph5VhSpAix-w0Q/max.png)

You crush your runes and turn your body into a conduit for sharing the effects of potions. The next time you consume a potion or similar item, any regained hit points that potion or item grants is also regained for all creatures of your choice within 10 feet. The spell then ends.

spell.name: Monster Examine

components.m: 1 Astral rune, 1 Cosmic rune, 1 Mind rune, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192004741/vI65LwBCfHp8rqn4iVQZFw/max.png)

You crush your runes and gain some insight on a particular species of creature. When you cast this spell, name a specific species or envision one with which you are familiar, then roll a d6. On a 1-4, the spell fails and you learn no information. On a 5-6, the spell succeeds, and you learn the following about the species:
• Damage vulnerabilities
• Damage resistances and immunities
• Condition immunities

The DM may inform you of additional traits. You may only cast this spell on a particular species once per day. You automatically succeed in casting this spell if you have seen a creature from this particular species in person.

spell.name: Contact Other

components.m: 2 air runes, 1 astral rune, 1 cosmic rune, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192004184/1K0QH0MIy7-FtJ3x-uM5Jw/med.png)

A spell for long distance communication. You crush your runes and create a telepathic link between yourself and a intelligent creature with which you are familiar. Using Contact Other to contact a person you need to speak for a clue requirement does NOT advance your progress in the Treasure Trail. You must speak to the person through normal means.

spell.name: Revenge

components.m: 10 earth runes, 3 astral runes, 2 death runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192007593/DcnGVB4_g9owwqDL3OiM2A/max.png)

A spell for reflecting damage. You crush your runes and create a shimmering force ready to reflect damage back at the attacker around a willing creatuer within range. Anytime in the next minute when the affected creature takes damage, they may use their reaction to deal half of the damage they took back at the attacker. The spell ends if you cast it again.

spell.name: Bake Pie

components.m: 1 Astral rune, 4 Water runes, 5 Fire runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192009062/OpciKmEBMwfM3ydiAzavsg/med.png)

You crush your runes and magically conjure a delicious baked pie within range. The pie has 3 servings that can be eaten as a bonus action. Each creature that eats a serving gains temporary hit points equal to 3d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier, and gains an additional benefit depending on the flavor of pie conjured:
• Cadavaberry: resistance to necrotic damage for 1 hour.
• Dwellberry: resistance to psychic damage for 1 hour.
• Jangerberry: resistance to acid damage for 1 hour.
• Poison Ivyberry: resistance to radiant damage for 1 hour.
• Redberry: resistance to poison damage for 1 hour.
• Strawberry: resistance to thunder damage for 1 hour.
• Whiteberry: resistance to force damage for 1 hour.

spell.name: Magic Imbue

components.m: 7 fire runes, 7 water runes, 1 astral rune, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192005865/jVWGQt_71nJpyiaP1zsmBA/med.png)

You charge a weapon with magic energy. When you cast this spell on a weapon you or another creature is holding, it is charged with magic and gains +1 to attack and damage rolls and deals an additional 2d10 force damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the extra damage increases to 1d10 for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Energy Transfer

Anytime in the next minute when the affected creature takes damage, they may use their reaction to deal damage to the attacker equal to the what they took. The spell ends if you cast it again.

spell.name: Vengance

components.m: 2 astral runes, 5 body runes, 1 cosmic rune, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192005668/yauiSuG_50GYCo8UJVQaaA/med.png)

A spell that allows for a quickened sleep. You crush your runes and you or a willing creature you touch fall unconscious for the spell’s duration. The spell ends on a target early if it takes damage or someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake. If a target remains unconscious for the full duration, that target gains the benefit of a long rest apart from the spell slot used to cast this spell.

spell.name: Spellbook swap

components.m: 1 law rune, 2 cosmic runes, 3 astral runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192008208/v-CbeELGpc9ZqXUqd6eLWQ/max.png)

When cast, pick any 7th level or lower spell you can cast. Roll a 1d20+[your spell mod] vs 10+[spell level]. If you succeed, you can use this bonus action to cast the spell. Only works for spells that are 1 action or bonus action in casting time.

spell.name: Superglass make

components.m: 20 fire runes, 20 earth runes, 10 astral runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192013287/dDLab6uy0IsO_yGxfT6PIw/max.png)

Casting this spell creates either a dome that has an up to 5ft radius or a up to 10ft long, 10ft high wall of "Superglass" to appear where you choose within 120ft. The Superglass is nearly completely transparent, and harmless to the touch. The Superglass possess an AC of 19 and HP of 100 and is vulnerable to bludgeoning damage. You can move the Superglass as part of your movement, if it is a dome and you are inside it, or if it is a wall and you are within 10ft of it. The Superglass is immune to fire, lightning, and cold damage and stops any cones or otherwise of those types from passing it. You and allies you designate can freely move through and cast spells through the dome, however projectile weapons such as bows will hit it. The dome regains 1d6+[spellcastingmodifier] hit points at the start of each of your turns.

spell.name: Magical Potion Share

components.m: 20 fire runes, 20 earth runes, 10 astral runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/192008852/TXv25r9mS7fN3SPTy-BhjQ/max.png)

You crush your runes and turn your body into a conduit for sharing the effects of potions. The next time the target consumes a potion or similar item,  every friendly creature within 10ft will also receive the effect. The spell then ends.

spell.name: Blood Rush

components.m: 2 Chaos runes, 2 Death runes, 1 Blood rune, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/191433146/BcY6h4SiBO5iqdEdpIfFgQ/max.png)

You crush your runes and extract some blood from a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes necrotic damage equal to 7d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier, and you regain a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt. The hit target then rolls a d12, gaining a level of exhaustion on a 1.

spell.name: Ice Rush

components.m: 2 Chaos runes, 2 Death runes, 2 Water runes, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/191433721/KLKeAsN7P_c6uag7CyXsJA/max.png)

You crush your runes and surround a creature within range with freezing air and snow. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes cold damage equal to 7d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier. Until the end of their second turn after being hit with this spell, the target's movement speed is reduced to 0, it may not take bonus actions or reactions, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, it can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn, and all attacks against the target are made with advantage. A creature affected by this spell makes a Strength saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Shadow Rush

components.m: 2 Chaos runes, 2 Death runes, 1 Soul rune, 1 Air rune, all of which the spell consumes

entries: [image](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/191427274/TO1fneti5nwpIAHbDXrlow/med.png)

You crush your runes and project your shadow upon a creature within range to disorient them. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes psychic damage equal to 7d10 + your spellcasting ability modifier. A hit target must then make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, for the next minute, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls and ability checks, and all attack rolls have advantage against the target. A creature affected by this spell makes an Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Smoke Rush

entries: [icon](https://s3.amazonaws.com/files.d20.io/images/233853152/OlsBK8j0MLvkVng5OX4LJQ/max.png)
